name: Happitown
description:
Hey welcome, this is my first ever game jam, and I made a little simple and fun game for the 2021 GameDev Game Jam. Nothing suspicious about this game, but that's for you to decide hehe.

You are an adventurer tasked with retrieving a gem from an old temple, but when you arrive at an unmentioned village, strange things begin to happen as the very fabric of reality begins to break.

Github: https://github.com/AFKRenegade/Happitown-Gamejam.git
